title: Stylish 1 Bed- Dog Friendly! Hardwood/ F-C Windows/ WD in unit/ Pool
posting_body: ['THE APARTMENT FEATURES', '-Hardwood Floors', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Floor to Ceiling Windows', '-Chef Inspired Kitchen w/ Quartz Countertops and Gas Range', '-Walk in Closet', '-In Unit Washer and Dryer', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '-24,000 Square Foot Sundeck w/ Lounge Seating, Fire Pits and Grilling Stations', '-Resort Inspired Swimming Pool and Hot Tub', '-Outdoor Yoga Studio', '-Fitness Center', '-Game', 'Room and Party Lounge', '-Private Dog Run and Grooming Station', '-Breathtaking Views', '-Controlled Access Parking Garage', '-24 hour Door Staff', 'Call or Email to schedule a tour.', 'We are available 7 days a week.', 'Downtown Apartment Company LLC', '730 N Wells Chicago, IL 60654', 'REF#98', 'Pictures are representative samples of the advertised unit.', 'In some cases, the actual units you tour may vary from the pictures based on the specific floor plan available.', 'Availability and prices are subject to change (and often do change daily).', 'Addresses, cross-streets or other geographic information, if provided, is intended to provide a general location of the advertised unit only; you should not rely on any address provided in this advertisement as an exact location of the unit.', 'Please contact us for exact addresses.', 'Units are leased unfurnished unless otherwise specified.', '12-month minimum lease term is standard for most units, but minimum term varies.', 'Equal housing opportunity.']
